    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(PlayerDetails playerDetails)
      Adds a new player to the game only if the game is uninitialized, there is at lest an empty player slot and there isn't any other player with that nickname.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Returns:

    • swapTowers

      void swapTowers(int islandGroupIndex, Tower newTower)
      the method is called after calculating the influence, whenever there is a change in the team that holds the most influence on the IslandGroup; the method search for the right Team Leader that will have to swap their team's towers with the one already on the island
      Overrides:
      swapTowers in class GameModel
      Parameters:
      islandGroupIndex - index of the IslandGroup considered
      newTower - to be put on the IslandGroup

    • startGame

      Starts the Game and randomly selects the first Player if the game is initialized.

      Overrides:
      startGame in class GameModel
      Returns:
      if the game started successfully.
